name: web-design
description: The first demo for testing usability for the course 'webdesign'. I'll be creating an overview of different photo's, which provider a larger version of the photo and more information when you click on it. The user should have clear understanding what the site is about when they enter the website. ## Design principles used For this assignment we must use at least three principles from the [list of 20 design principles.](http://bokardo.com/principles-of-user-interface-design/)
